_header: In our gospel is goodly graid / How Christ to his disciples said
Note: For another text of this Gospel see 4627.
_description: Gospel for Fourth Sunday after Easter, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: In oure godspell es gudely graidHow crist to his desciples said…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so to do in all oure dedeþat heuyni blis may be oure mede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Uado ad eum qui misit me.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica iii post octava pasche Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 93rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.206-210.
